page.title: 13HORNSEA GAMES - LEAPFROG
page.content:
You can have two or more players in this game. The aim is to be able to leap the person who is down.
To play the game one person has to stand on his / her feet and bend over. The other people stand in a line.
The first one in the line runs up to the person bending over, putting his hands on whoever is down. Then he / she puts his / her weight onto the back of the person who is down.Then he / she springs up and opens his / her legs. He / she leaps right over the person.
Then it is the next person's turn.
Rebecca Willans
